page.title: 16PATTINSON'S FRUIT FARM
page.content: Mr Pattinson started his fruitfarm in Gt.Horkesley in 1935 with 60 acres.There are now 332 acres and the orchards strech out as far as leaven heath. Desert apples are grown on 272 acres_about 80,000 trees.The main crop being Cox apples.Black currants are grown on the other 60 acres but this varies from year to year as the bushes are grubbed out and replanted.The farm employs 15 men and 22 women full time and in the picking season about 200 casual workers.They have storage for 15,036 tons of apples and distribute apples to the sale mackets throughout the U.K.Many fruit farms work together as a cr_opertive but Pattinsons work on their own and are the largest independant growers in the U.K.Next season they hope to export the early Discovery apples to Belguim.
